Welcome!

My name is Kelle Clark, and I am a Mathematics and Computer Science enthusiast. I honestly enjoy researching every concept that I come across.

This site allows me to journal my exploration into these fields, catalog great resources and share my ideas with others.

Please visit my TIE (Today I Explored) blog-like page, checkout my Projects page to view samples of my work or view my resume. To contact me, click the "About Me" icon in the upper left corner of this card.





Contact Me
